kDesc

This special edition bundle includes;
 
 ● Savage Cosmos - Arcade Cabinet
 ● Electrokid - Arcade Cabinet
 ● Superhero Madhouse - Arcade Cabinet
 
 Plus the following exclusive items only available in this bundle;
 
 ● Savage Cosmos - Helmet - Male
 ● Savage Cosmos - Helmet - Female
 ● Electrokid - Head - Male
 ● Electrokid - Head - Female
 ● Superhero Madhouse - Diamond of a Thousand Princesses Snowglobe [#Legal]

Ce pack en édition spéciale comprend :
 
 ● Savage Cosmos - Borne d'arcade
 ● Electrokid - Borne d'arcade
 ● Superhero Madhouse — Console Arcade
 
 Ainsi que les articles suivants, disponibles exclusivement dans ce pack :
 
 ● Savage Cosmos - Casque - Homme
 ● Savage Cosmos - Casque - Femme
 ● Electrokid - Tête - Homme
 ● Electrokid - Tête - Femme
 ● Superhero Madhouse - Diamant D'un Millier De Princesses [#Legal]

Dieses Sonderausgaben-Paket enthält;
 
 ● Savage Cosmos - Arcade-Automat
 ● Electrokid - Arcade-Automat
 ● Superhero Madhouse - Arcade-Automat
 
 Plus die folgenden exklusiven Artikel, die nur in diesem Paket erhältlich sind; 
 ● Savage Cosmos - Helm - Männlich
 ● Savage Cosmos - Helm - Weiblich
 ● Electrokid - Kopf - Männlich
 ● Electrokid - Kopf - Weiblich
 ● Superhero Madhouse - Diamanten Der Tausend Prinzessinnen [#Legal]

Questo set in edizione speciale contiene:
 
 ● Savage Cosmos - Console di gioco
 ● Electrokid - Console di gioco
 ● Superhero Madhouse - Videogioco arcade
 
 Contiene inoltre i seguenti elementi esclusivi disponibili soltanto in questo set:
 
 ● Savage Cosmos - Casco - Da Uomo
 ● Savage Cosmos - Casco - Da Donna
 ● Electrokid - Testa - Da Uomo
 ● Electrokid - Testa - Da Donna
 ● Superhero Madhouse - Diamante Appartenuto A Mille Principesse [#Legal]

Este pack edición especial incluye:
 
 ● Savage Cosmos - Máquina recreativa
 ● Electrokid - Máquina recreativa
 ● Superhero Madhouse - Máquina recreativa
 
 Además de los siguientes artículos exclusivos, sólo disponibles con este pack:
 
 ● Savage Cosmos - Casco - Hombre
 ● Savage Cosmos - Casco - Mujer
 ● Electrokid - Cabeza - Hombre
 ● Electrokid - Cabeza - Mujer
 ● Superhero Madhouse - Diamante Del Millar De Princesas [#Legal]

이 특별한 번들은 다음을 포함합니다:
 
 ● 새비지 코스모스 - 아케이드 캐비닛
 ● Electrokid - 아케이드 캐비닛
 ● Superhero Madhouse - 아케이드 캐비닛
 
 그리고 오직 이 번들에서만 제공되는 다음 아이템들이 포함됩니다:
 
 ● 새비지 코스모스 - 헬멧 (남성)
 ● 새비지 코스모스 - 헬멧 (여성)
 ● Electrokid - 머리 (남성)
 ● Electrokid - 머리 (여성)
 ● Superhero Madhouse - 천공주의 다이아몬드 스노우글로브

 ※구입하면 해당 카테고리에 각 아이템이 추가됩니다.[#Legal]

This special edition bundle includes:
 
 ・Savage Cosmos - Arcade Cabinet
 ・Electrokid - Arcade Cabinet
 ・Superhero Madhouse - Arcade Cabinet
 
 Plus the following exclusive items only available in this bundle:
 
 ・Savage Cosmos - Helmet (Men)
 ・Savage Cosmos - Helmet (Women)
 ・Electrokid - Head (Men)
 ・Electrokid - Head (Women)
 ・Superhero Madhouse - Diamond of a Thousand Princesses Snowglobe

 ※Upon purchase, the items will be placed into their respective categories. [#Legal]
